Reviews.Title: Love My Phone
Reviews.Author: Misslillyinthevalley "MissAngel"
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely like my phone. I will first talk about what i dislike and then what i like. The ONLY  thing that I dislike about this phone is the recording view. When recording, the light diminishescausing your surrounding to look darker. The camera is not that great in quality. My family always uses Samsung products and this is the first Samsung product ive gotten with a crappy camera. Other than the camera, the phone works excellect. I have net10 & i get great service. I use it as a tablet to write my books. Check out See You Again on Amazon for a great short story. I use it foreverything. You will be happy with your purchase

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 3 T311 8.0'' GSM Factory Unlocked Phone/Tablet
Reviews.Author: LUIS
Reviews.Content: This is one of the top Galaxy device.  I love it.For movies and readers lover this is perfect. I use T-mobile, the internet works fast and the connection is very stable.I only gave 5 stars because that the maximum available.  I high recommend this product 10/10.

Reviews.Title: Lot of issues. Not an American version.
Reviews.Author: Hash
Reviews.Content: I received the packet unsealed - dont know why the seal was broken. It gets shipped from China and has a lot of difference as compared to tablets made for American market. The google play app does not work and a lot of applications were not able to install. The tablet hangs sometimes.I would not recommend anyone to buy it as some features like Keypad are starkly different and odd than regular American version. Even if we change the input setings to American English.

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Hector Luis Giusto
Reviews.Content: I have had all Samsung Tab series up to now, this again is very good.Screen and app improve the last version that I had.My options were always international versions, no problem with the local link.Good choice and price.

Reviews.Title: Best battery life.
Reviews.Author: ambujadengu
Reviews.Content: Battery life is the best I have ever had in a tablet. It's internet browsing is friendly. A complete charge will give you many hours doing stuff. I love it.

Reviews.Title: It's A Phone-It's A Tablet--It's 2 Devices in ONE!
Reviews.Author: Vicki Bentzien
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted to carry one device that was a phone & tablet!  Not too big, not too small, and this "phablet" is just right for me.  I took my AT&T; micro sim from my Note 2 into the sim card slot of the Tab 3 and Voile, I had instant phone and data.  Wow!  I use this device with a BT Bose Headset so I can listen to my music or radio, answer phone calls, etc.  Got the SuperNight dock/cover/ keyboard and I be stylin'.  I am able to sync my 2013 MS Office Calendar and Contacts installed on my desktop Dell Windows 8.1 using MyPhoneExplorer.  I can hook up the USB cable to the "phablet" charge port and then my thumb drive is seen as a drive!  I use Office Suite Pro for editing and Polaris Office for printing.The only feature missing?  A flash for the camera, which by the way is 5.0 on the back.  Neither were deal-breakers for me as I am not that big of a camera buff and really wanted the phone-tablet combo for the other features.  For me, this is device is serving me well.  I recognize that device choices are based on personal preference, features, needs, wants, $, etc. so this might or might not be for YOU!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Stevenson Cuartas M
Reviews.Content: The Tab works very well thank you very much! I'm glad with my item at home. Regards From Venezuela thanks again.

Reviews.Title: Turbulence but connected now because of  an Angel
Reviews.Author: C. Jameson "MagickJade"
Reviews.Content: Got the tablet just fine and set it my cellular.  AT&T; like to have never figured out what to do to get it to pickup the towers but after 2 days talking with AT&T; one amazing lady figured it out & it works fabulously now!  Woohoo!  I am a connected person with a great tablet. Thx

Reviews.Title: Compliments and suggestion
Reviews.Author: Mariano D'Silva
Reviews.Content: Can this be charged with 220V power? It is indeed an excellent piece. Suggestion: Need to have one inlet of macro sim card.

Reviews.Title: i like it quick and nice
Reviews.Author: Abudnaser Abdusamad
Reviews.Content: i like it, quick and nice my son also like always play with it really it is very nice he also like it

Reviews.Title: very useful and functional.
Reviews.Author: Ehab Shehata
Reviews.Content: comparing the IPAD mini.this is as much good and more as Ipad mini except in screen resolution is less and IOS which is more stable.comparing to price, it is more better.

Reviews.Title: product fit my expectation
Reviews.Author: mirco
Reviews.Content: product fit my expectationi got it on timepackage was goodproduct is goodi am satisfied as usual

Reviews.Title: Touch response is too slow
Reviews.Author: Prakash
Reviews.Content: Bought this at last minute during my travel to India, Tab was unlocked as promised, it worked well with Tmobile in US and Airtel in India, but when ever i swipe or type something in keyboard, its hanging for 10 seconds and this is for each key press that makes it more miserable, when contacted Samsung service center in Inidia they responded that it needs software update but told they wont do as its been bought in US, now i dont know what to do with it :( , can someone help me to resolve this issue.,

Reviews.Title: Great Phablet
Reviews.Author: Catherine Sherman
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product not realizing the actual size. It is a little bit too big but has other features that out weigh that one negative. I am able to do a great deal with this product and I believe it is well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: not working properly
Reviews.Author: Ma Jinduo
Reviews.Content: 1. automatically shut down itself2. sometimes incoming calls going straight to voice mail with the phone ringing (i am positive not because of signal)

Reviews.Title: tablet works great
Reviews.Author: Rex Bowles
Reviews.Content: It was easy to learn and use,but the phone is expensive to use syncs all my stuff real well good product so far.

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Julio A. Ortiz Pineda
Reviews.Content: use it everyday battery last for long periods of time i charge every 2 or days, really usefull kudos!! BTW i contacted the seller and they anwser really fast (Y)(Y)!! worth every penny

Reviews.Title: not served the team from the beginning
Reviews.Author: WILMER ROBLES
Reviews.Content: well actually buy the product and try to use the system to perform the call is not served the port for the sim card, so I contacted the dealer and his answer was that the teams have not unlocked warranty, which seems very bad because it is a product that cancel almost 400 dollars and brand new can not use it because it came with default, I'm very upset to see how such a slight response for such a good product like samsung tablet tab 3, and so expensive not think of me the appropriate response.Shopping by amazon have time and had not had any problems so far I see myself seriously affected buy such an expensive product and not to use it.
